column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: cost. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix cost: <http://example.org/cost#> .cost:Cost rdf:type rdfs:Class .cost:hasAmount rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain cost:Cost ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal .cost:hasCurrency rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain cost:Cost ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .cost:associatedWith rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain cost:Cost ;    rdfs:range cost:GoodOrService .cost:GoodOrService rdf:type rdfs:Class .cost:hasDescription rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain cost:GoodOrService ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .
